## pushSort() function

Similar to [push()](./transducers.push.md)<!-- -->, but sorts result array upon completion using optionally given comparator (default [compare](./compare.compare.md)<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pushSort<T>(cmp?: Comparator<T>): Reducer<T[], T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cmp | <code>Comparator&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<T[], T>`
